nodes.id: 胡锦涛二十大离场事件

zh-cn: 胡锦涛二十大离场事件
en: Hu Jintao incident at the 20th CCP National Congress

location.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市西城区人民大会堂
location.en: Great Hall of the People, Xicheng District, Beijing, People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 指在2022年10月22日中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会闭幕会上，前中共中央总书记胡锦涛被工作人员带离会场的事件。
description.en: Refers to the incident on October 22, 2022, at the closing session of the 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party, where former General Secretary Hu Jintao was escorted out of the venue by staff.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, incumbent General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，时任中共中央办公厅副主任兼秘书局局长，被认为是习近平的贴身秘书。
description.en: Chinese politician, then Deputy Director of the General Office of the CCP Central Committee and Director of the Secretariat Bureau, considered to be Xi Jinping's personal secretary.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，在事件发生时坐在胡锦涛左侧。
description.en: Chinese politician, who was seated to the left of Hu Jintao when the incident occurred.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，被视为团派的代表人物之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, considered one of the representative figures of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction).

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，被视为团派的代表人物之一。
description.en: Chinese politician, considered one of the representative figures of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction).

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，国务院副总理，被视为团派的代表人物。
description.en: Chinese politician, Vice Premier of the State Council, considered a representative figure of the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction).

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，胡锦涛之子，时任浙江省丽水市委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, son of Hu Jintao, then Party Secretary of Lishui, Zhejiang Province.

description.zh-cn: 前中共中央组织部干部。
description.en: Former official of the Organization Department of the CCP Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, former General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会
en: 20th National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party

location.en: Great Hall of the People, Beijing

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党于2022年10月召开的全国代表大会，在此次大会的闭幕会上发生了胡锦涛离场事件。
description.en: The National Congress of the Chinese Communist Party held in October 2022, during the closing session of which the Hu Jintao incident occurred.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第一次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第一次全体会议
en: 1st Plenary Session of the 20th Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 选举产生了新一届中共中央政治局委员，胡春华未入选。
description.en: Elected the new members of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee, in which Hu Chunhua was not included.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的最高领导人职务。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党内的一个非正式派系，指代有中国共产主义青年团工作经历的干部群体，胡锦涛被认为是其代表人物。
description.en: An informal faction within the Communist Party of China, referring to a group of officials with work experience in the Communist Youth League of China. Hu Jintao is considered its representative figure.

description.zh-cn: 位于东亚的国家，由中国共产党执政。
description.en: A country in East Asia governed by the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的国家通讯社。
description.en: The state news agency of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆的社交媒体平台。
description.en: A social media platform in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的建筑，是全国人民代表大会的开会地点和全国人大常委会的办公场所。
description.en: A state building located in Beijing, China, used for legislative and ceremonial activities by the government of the People's Republic of China and the Communist Party of China.

zh-cn: 胡锦涛领导下的自由主义黄金时代

description.zh-cn: 指胡锦涛担任中共中央总书记和温家宝担任国务院总理时期的中国政治体制，习近平在二十大报告中对其有所批评。
description.en: Refers to the period of Chinese politics under the leadership of General Secretary Hu Jintao and Premier Wen Jiabao, which was criticized in Xi Jinping's report at the 20th Party Congress.

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大闭幕会上，习近平示意后，胡锦涛被工作人员带离会场。期间，胡锦涛曾试图拿取习近平面前的文件，但被习近平亲手压住。
description.en: At the closing session of the 20th CCP National Congress, after a signal from Xi Jinping, Hu Jintao was escorted out by staff. During the process, Hu attempted to take documents from Xi's desk, but Xi held them down with his hand.

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大闭幕会上，孔绍逊在收到习近平的指示后，与另一名工作人员将胡锦涛带离会场。
description.en: At the closing session of the 20th CCP National Congress, Kong Shaoxun, along with another staff member, escorted Hu Jintao out of the venue after receiving instructions from Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大闭幕会上，栗战书将胡锦涛面前的文件抽走，阻止其查看。
description.en: At the closing session of the 20th CCP National Congress, Li Zhanshu took the documents from in front of Hu Jintao, preventing him from viewing them.

description.zh-cn: 文本描述孔绍逊为习近平的贴身秘书，并在事件中听从其吩咐行动。
description.en: The text describes Kong Shaoxun as Xi Jinping's personal secretary who acted on his instructions during the incident.

description.zh-cn: 在被带离会场时，胡锦涛俯身向习近平短暂交代。
description.en: While being escorted out, Hu Jintao leaned over and briefly spoke to Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 在被带离会场时，胡锦涛拍了拍李克强的肩膀。
description.en: While being escorted out, Hu Jintao patted Li Keqiang on the shoulder.

description.zh-cn: 胡海峰是胡锦涛的儿子。
description.en: Hu Haifeng is the son of Hu Jintao.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大上，李克强未被选入新一届中央委员会，标志着其政治生涯的结束。
description.en: At the 20th CCP National Congress, Li Keqiang was not elected to the new Central Committee, marking the end of his political career.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第二十次全国代表大会

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大上，汪洋未被选入新一届中央委员会，标志着其退出权力核心。
description.en: At the 20th CCP National Congress, Wang Yang was not elected to the new Central Committee, signaling his departure from the core of power.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第一次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十届一中全会上，胡春华没有入选新一届中央政治局委员，此举被外界视为对团派势力的清洗。
description.en: At the 1st Plenary Session of the 20th CCP Central Committee, Hu Chunhua was not elected to the new Politburo, a move widely seen as a purge of the Tuanpai faction.

description.zh-cn: 在中共二十大后，以胡锦涛为代表的团派人物如李克强、汪洋、胡春华等均退出权力核心，被外界广泛视为习近平对团派势力的彻底清洗。
description.en: After the 20th CCP National Congress, figures from the Tuanpai (Youth League Faction) represented by Hu Jintao, such as Li Keqiang, Wang Yang, and Hu Chunhua, all exited the core of power. This was widely interpreted by outside observers as a thorough purge of the Tuanpai faction by Xi Jinping.

relationships.target: 胡锦涛二十大离场事件

description.zh-cn: 事件发生后，中国官方对相关信息进行了严格的审查，中国大陆媒体未对此事进行报道，社交平台上的讨论也遭到了封杀。
description.en: After the incident, Chinese authorities imposed strict censorship on related information. Mainland Chinese media did not report on the matter, and discussions on social media platforms were blocked.

relationships.target: 胡锦涛二十大离场事件

description.zh-cn: 新华社通过其英文推特账号发布了官方解释，称胡锦涛离场是因“身体不适”，试图影响外界对此事件的看法。
description.en: Xinhua News Agency released the official explanation via its English Twitter account, stating that Hu Jintao left because he was 'not feeling well', in an attempt to influence external perceptions of the incident.

description.zh-cn: 2022年10月底，前中共中央组织部干部阎淮公开致信习近平，要求其就胡锦涛被带离事件进行说明，以此公开表达不满和施压。
description.en: In late October 2022, former CCP Organization Department official Yan Huai publicly wrote a letter to Xi Jinping, demanding an explanation for the Hu Jintao incident, thereby publicly expressing dissatisfaction and applying pressure.

description.zh-cn: 胡锦涛到中国人民解放军总医院为逝世的前总书记江泽民送别，这是他在二十大事件后首次公开露面。
description.en: Hu Jintao went to the PLA General Hospital to pay his last respects to the deceased former General Secretary Jiang Zemin. This was his first public appearance after the incident at the 20th Party Congress.

description.zh-cn: 习近平在中共二十大报告中，通过批评“一系列长期积累及新出现的突出矛盾和问题”，间接否定了胡锦涛和温家宝执政时期的政治遗产。
description.en: In his report to the 20th CCP National Congress, Xi Jinping indirectly negated the political legacy of the Hu-Wen Administration by criticizing 'a series of long-standing and newly emerging prominent contradictions and problems'.
